title: Twelve Tales of Trepidation
description: What are your greatest fears? From living on the streets to being rejected by a lover, from unexplainable ghostly events to falling in love with a ghost, from sheer insanity to the everlasting torture of a lover's triangle, from mayhem and accidental murder to mere stage-fright, Galeassi explores them all in these tragically ironic though often comedic stories.
author: Damon Galeassi
